page.title: 05HOME LIFE:Family Sunday
page.content: On sunday morning we stay in bed until ten o'clock. My mother and Father get up first.It takes about half an hour to make our breakfast. I am usually listening to the Archers on the radio.Then I get up.Sometimes I have my breakfast in my pyjamas if I am tired. My brother spends most of the morning in bed. After breakfast I feed the cat and dog. There is nothing on T.V which we like , so we go down to the allotments. Mother usually stays at home to do the cleaning. At one o'clock we have our lunch which is usually beans or tomatoes on toast. If the weather is fine we go back to the allotments until 6.00p.m. when we have our supper.It is usually something special like fish or chicken whith white wine or cider.After tea I feed the cat and dog, and practice my cornet. Then I watch the television.
